footer.description: We research scientific diagnostics and healthy food for a happy life with pets.
footer.address: Seogu Startup Center, B1123, Sangmu-daero, Seo-gu, Gwangju, Republic of Korea

hero.title:
The Start of
Smart Healthcare for Dogs
hero.description: LabinBio provides a total solution to easily diagnose your pet's health at home with cutting-edge bio technology and manage it with healthy snacks.

diagnostic.label: Diagnostic Kit
diagnostic.title:
Start
Pet Health Check at Home
diagnostic.description:
No stress, no vet visit needed.
LabinBio diagnostic kits help detect early signs of major diseases like kidney disease and diabetes through your pet's urine.

steps.title: Simple Test
steps.desc: 1 minute at home is enough. Check your pet's health status with a urine test.

steps.title: App Results
steps.desc: Scan the test result with our app to see real-time analysis.

steps.title: Steady Management
steps.desc: Accumulate test records to monitor health trends and prevent issues.

chew.label: Healthy Snack
chew.title:
Protect
Dental Health while Chewing
chew.description:
LabinBio Dental Chew is more than just a snack.
It is a functional dental care solution designed with veterinary dental experts.

benefits.title: Tartar & Breath Care
benefits.desc: Specially designed cross-section effectively removes plaque between teeth.

benefits.title: Allergy Free
benefits.desc: Grain-free formula excluding grain allergy-inducing ingredients.

benefits.title: Stress Relief
benefits.desc: Relieves stress with appropriate hardness for long-lasting chewing.

story.main_title:
"Can we notice the pain
of our silent children first?"
story.main_desc: LabinBio started from this small but desperate question.
story.quote: "If you love them, start diagnosing, not just observing."
story.p1: Pets do not show it even if they are sick. Because of their instinct to hide pain, it is often too late when guardians notice abnormal signs.
story.p2: We wanted to protect this 'Golden Time'. What if anyone could easily and accurately check their health status at home, even if they can't go to the vet every day?
story.p3: Born after years of research by veterinary experts and data scientists, LabinBio now aims to be the most reliable health partner for pet families around the world.

cert.title:
Proven Quality,
Reliable Manufacturing
cert.desc: All LabinBio products are produced in facilities that have passed international standard quality management systems and strict food safety management standards.

block1.label: Machine Vision AI
block1.title:
AI Color Analysis Algorithm
with Zero Error
block1.desc: Proprietary deep learning AI model trained on tens of thousands of pet urine data points detects minute color changes. It analyzes subtle color differences indistinguishable by the human eye to provide highly reliable results.

block2.label: Ambient Light Correction
block2.title:
Automatic Environmental
Variable Correction
block2.desc: Automatically corrects color distortion caused by different lighting environments (fluorescent, incandescent, natural light, etc.) and shooting angles in every home. Standardizing results in any environment is the core of LabinBio's technology.

block3.label: Dental Health Science
block3.title:
Dual-Action
Oral Care Mechanism
block3.desc: A double care solution combining physical friction and active ingredients. The specially designed Air Hole structure removes tartar deep in the gum line without irritation, and SHMP & OraCMU ingredients inhibit bad breath-causing bacteria.

app.main_title:
Veterinarian in Your Pocket,
LabinBio App
app.main_desc: Manage everything from complex health records to expert consultations smartly with one app.

features.title: Real-time Health Report
features.desc: Shows analysis results and risk levels for 10 items in an intuitive graph immediately after scanning.

features.title: Health History Tracking
features.desc: Accumulate past test records to grasp health trends at a glance and prevent abnormalities.

features.title: Vet Consultation Connection
features.desc: If you have more questions about the test results, you can proceed with non-face-to-face consultation with affiliated veterinarians.

partner.main_title:
We are looking for partners
to grow with us
partner.main_desc: LabinBio is waiting for partners in various fields to create an innovative pet healthcare ecosystem together.

cards.title: Animal Hospital
cards.desc: Medical connection using LabinBio test results and introduction of smart healthcare solutions

cards.title: Distribution/Sales
cards.desc: LabinBio product entry and sales partnership in on/offline pet shops, pharmacies, etc.

cards.title: Investment/Funding
cards.desc: Recruiting investors and funding partners to join LabinBio's innovative growth

cta.title: Propose Partnership
cta.desc:
Please send your company introduction and partnership proposal via email.
Our team will review and contact you shortly.

support.desc:
If you have any inconvenience or need help while using the product, please leave an inquiry.
Our representative will check and reply promptly.
